name: Choice Surveillance
tagline: I don't take your security lightly!
body:
### Welcome to Choice Surveillance
Thank you for visiting my site. My name is Lee Garcia. Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have. Listing below does not represent all that can be done for you but are some examples of what I have done in either commercial or residential settings. New and old work. References can be given for those who want extra piece of mind. Proven track record.  

I offer:  
-Home, Sprinkler and Garage Door Automation (using custom programmed phone app)  
-Access Control (from wiring and hardware installation to custom computer programming)   
-Licensed Alarm Installation, troubleshooting, maintenance and repair   
-Lighting Control installation  
-Custom lighting control solutions  
-Audio/Video Installation, troubleshooting, maintenance and repair  
-Custom Audio/Video setups (home theater, whole home audio, in wall iPad dock, etc.)  
-Networking Installation, troubleshooting, maintenance and repair  
-Server Installation, troubleshooting, maintenance and repair  
-Pre-wire of a custom built home or business to suit your needs  
-Camera Installation and Maintenance  
-2 way microphone communications via camera and or external mic and loudspeaker (interview rooms, etc)  
-Custom CCTV Video Monitoring Solutions for the home to even the most secure environments  

### Experience
My latest contract job was working for the State of Texas installing cameras and maintaining, repairing, running new cables for small four camera systems to large thousand plus camera sites with custom monitoring solutions. High security is my specialty. I have attended various training seminars by top video monitoring companies. I am certified to work with various VMS solutions. I am also licensed by the state of Texas for installing alarm equipment. I am also RTI certified for those wanting an affordable whole home remote solution. I have been working in my related field for over 10 years. Building my knowledge and work ethic. I take pride in my work. Rest easy knowing I'll treat your home or business with the utmost respect and offer the highest professionalism.

### Service Areas
I serve the greater Houston area, Pearland, Missouri City, Stafford, Sugarland and surrounding areas. No job is too small or too large.

### Support or Contact
Please feel free to email me at lee@choicesurveillance.com for any questions. Or for a faster response call me at 281-410-1006. Thanks and have a nice day!
